restaurants.name: Ducky Duck
restaurants.description: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure.

categories.title: Fruits
categories.description: Naturally sweet and often juicy foods that typically contain seeds. They are rich in vitamins, minerals, and fiber, and are important for a balanced diet.

categories.title: Vegetables
categories.description: Edible parts of plants, such as roots, stems, leaves, and flowers, that are consumed for their nutritional value. They are low in calories and high in nutrients.

categories.title: Grains
categories.description: Edible seeds of certain grasses, such as rice, wheat, oats, and barley. They are a primary source of carbohydrates and provide energy to the body.

categories.title: Proteins
categories.description: Essential nutrients for the body's growth and repair. They are found in foods like meat, poultry, fish, eggs, dairy products, legumes, and plant-based alternatives.

categories.title: Dairy
categories.description: Products derived from milk, such as cheese, yogurt, and butter. They are rich in calcium, protein, and other essential nutrients for bone health and overall wellness.

categories.title: Fats and oils
categories.description: Concentrated sources of energy that provide essential fatty acids. They are found in foods like oils, butter, avocado, nuts, and seeds, and are important for cell function.

categories.title: Sweets and desserts
categories.description: Foods that are high in sugar and often consumed for their taste rather than nutritional value. They include items like cakes, cookies, candies, and sweetened beverages.

categories.title: Beverages
categories.description: Liquid consumables, including water, tea, coffee, juice, milk, and soft drinks. They are essential for hydration and can also provide various nutrients and flavors.

categories.title: Snacks
categories.description: Small, casual meals or treats consumed between regular meals. They can be savory or sweet and include items like chips, nuts, popcorn, crackers, and dried fruits.

categories.title: Condiments and spices
categories.description: Substances used to enhance the flavor of food. They include items like salt, pepper, herbs, spices, sauces, and dressings, and are often added during cooking or serving.
